text: Suthep Thaugsuban (; born 7 July 1949) is a Thai politician. He is the leader of People's Alliance for Democracy. In 2013, he organized a protest in Bangkok against the government. He led protesters in "Occupying Bangkok". In 2014 he became a Buddhist monk. Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Buddhist monks Suthep Thaugsuban
title: Suthep Thaugsuban
